title: Can I publish Telugu paper books Amazon Kindle direct publishing? - Quora

response.answer_text: I beg to differ with Lalith Kumar. There are Telegu titles available. They are publishing in all the languages. There are some shortcomings but the contents are easily readable. Well, they do not publish the paperback for Indian languages for present. Ebooks are definitely available. Check it on the Amazon site. You may find it.
Amazon does not support Telugu language for direct publishing yet. Waiting for it to happen. Get help with self-publishing your book to Amazon's Kindle Store
